reviewText: 65 million years ago, the fascinating creatures know as dinosaurs roamed the earth.  Now, learn all about their amazing history in this excellent gift set from the PBS hit series, NOVA.  This excellent set of documentaries highlights the reptilian beasts and their way of life in ancient days before the dawn of man.  Be ready for outstanding scripting and filmography, as well as a wealth of information, including a plethora of little-known facts.  These tapes are highly recommended.  Buy this gift set before this great offer becomes extinct!
